email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. Our starting freight rate is USD 42/MT on CIF terms. The laycan is 25-30 October. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering it to USD 38/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. Considering the current market, I can offer a revised rate of USD 40/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 40/MT sounds reasonable. Can you confirm the laycan remains 25-30 October? Also, please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Please find attached the charter party for your review. The laycan remains 25-30 October. Let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
